note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Prevalence rate of diabetes in adults
subtitle: Estimated share of people with [diabetes](#dod:diabetes) among those aged over 18, based on general population surveys and statistical modeling. Diabetes is a [risk factor](#dod:risk-factor) for chronic complications, including [cardiovascular disease](#dod:cvd), and premature death.
variantName: WHO Global Health Observatory, age-standardized, estimated
